properties.name: Khiz Volcano
properties.legend: Dormant volcano. Height: 6400 m.

properties.name: Kharag Volcano
properties.legend: Erupting volcano. Height: 3721 m.

properties.name: Hot Springs of Mabadrar
properties.legend: A geothermal springs with naturally heated water that provide relaxation and medicinal benefits. Average temperature is 39Â°C.

properties.name: Hot Springs of Milaugmar
properties.legend: A geothermal springs with naturally heated water that provide relaxation and medicinal benefits. Average temperature is 27Â°C.

properties.name: Simynatheine Purifying Well
properties.legend: This legendary water source is whispered about in ancient tales and believed to possess mystical properties. The spring emanates crystal-clear water, shimmering with an otherworldly iridescence that sparkles even in the dimmest light.

properties.name: Niosanaseri â€” salt mining town
properties.legend: Niosanaseri is a mining town of 6606 people just nearby the salt mine.

properties.name: Gauntlet â€” gold mining town
properties.legend: Gauntlet is a mining town of 119113 people just nearby the gold mine.

properties.name: Horngay â€” iron mining town
properties.legend: Horngay is a mining town of 37929 people just nearby the iron mine.

properties.name: Trliondest â€” gold mining town
properties.legend: Trliondest is a mining town of 11742 people just nearby the gold mine.

properties.name: Gathizdush â€” gold mining town
properties.legend: Gathizdush is a mining town of 745 people just nearby the gold mine.

properties.name: Fyndustuz â€” silver mining town
properties.legend: Fyndustuz is a mining town of 13549 people just nearby the silver mine.

properties.name: Akzargil â€” copper mining town
properties.legend: Akzargil is a mining town of 755 people just nearby the copper mine.

properties.name: Cyhsetenat Bridge
properties.legend: A lengthy bridge spans over the Shuled River near Cyhsetenat.

properties.name: The Ancient Horse
properties.legend: A big and famous roadside tavern. Delicious smoked peas with grey milk is served here.

properties.name: The Yellow Antelope
properties.legend: A big and famous roadside tavern. Delicious pickled antelope with ice spirits is served here.

properties.name: The Grey Jackal
properties.legend: A big and famous roadside tavern. Delicious roasted hart with smelly liquor is served here.

properties.name: Barangrim Lighthouse
properties.legend: A lighthouse to serve as a beacon for ships in the open sea.

properties.name: Aragz Lighthouse
properties.legend: A lighthouse to serve as a beacon for ships in the open sea.

properties.name: Elelthinlean Lighthouse
properties.legend: A lighthouse to serve as a beacon for ships in the open sea.

properties.name: Heimruch Lighthouse
properties.legend: A lighthouse to serve as a beacon for ships in the open sea.

properties.name: Shathardis Lighthouse
properties.legend: A lighthouse to serve as a beacon for ships in the open sea.

properties.name: Enoralindellese Lighthouse
properties.legend: A lighthouse to serve as a beacon for ships in the open sea.

properties.name: Bogdmagaanese Waterfall
properties.legend: A breathtaking waterfall cuts through the landscape.

properties.name: Haktormawara Battlefield
properties.legend:
A historical battle of the Yvakan Intervention. 
Date: January 31, 1564 Ek't Era.

properties.name: Rasharvanbu Battlefield
properties.legend:
A historical battle of the Gor War. 
Date: June 17, 1262 Ek't Era.

properties.name: Krigh Battlefield
properties.legend:
A historical battle of the Cloud Campaign. 
Date: November 7, 1643 Ek't Era.

properties.name: Oatercairn Battlefield
properties.legend:
A historical battle of the Cloudhil Conquest. 
Date: December 21, 1644 Ek't Era.

properties.name: Lhovak'ser Battlefield
properties.legend:
A historical battle of the Oldian Invasion. 
Date: July 28, 1648 Ek't Era.

properties.name: Bhir Battlefield
properties.legend:
A historical battle of the Isthan Conquest. 
Date: December 27, 1568 Ek't Era.

properties.name: Tahathalan Battlefield
properties.legend:
A historical battle of the Curowish Crusade. 
Date: June 8, 1644 Ek't Era.

properties.name: Ugausthadiz Monster
properties.legend: Journeying folk say a relic monster of 11 m long inhabits Ugausthadiz Lake. Truth or lie, folks are afraid to fish in the lake.

properties.name: Moury Monster
properties.legend: Old sailors tell stories of a gigantic sea monster inhabiting these dangerous waters. Rumors say it can be 31 m long.

properties.name: Tagelces Monster
properties.legend: Old sailors tell stories of a gigantic sea monster inhabiting these dangerous waters. Rumors say it can be 24 m long.

properties.name: Karmani Cyclops
properties.legend: Rumors speak of a great Cyclops who inhabits Karmani hills and harasses travelers in the area.

properties.name: Arithlu Hydra
properties.legend: Tipplers speak of a feared Hydra who inhabits Arithlu hills and attacks anyone who dares to approach its lair.

properties.name: Kakzund Forest
properties.legend: A forest sacred to local Faith of Thenor.

properties.name: Iceveinpass Forest
properties.legend: A forest sacred to local Dedhremolag Pantheon.

properties.name: Kozok Forest
properties.legend: A forest sacred to local Witnesses of Emelenyari.

properties.name: Drymond Pinery
properties.legend: A pinery sacred to local Lereliscom Deities.

properties.name: Rhisned Pinery
properties.legend: A pinery sacred to local Witnesses of Emelenyari.

properties.name: Shadush Palm Grove
properties.legend: A palm grove sacred to local Word of Aklunyurt.

properties.name: Bremrud Falcons
properties.legend: A gang of forest bandits.

properties.name: Tsakhandorbu Falcons
properties.legend: A gang of forest bandits.

properties.name: Argongo Hares
properties.legend: A gang of forest bandits.

properties.name: Gegzil Wolverines
properties.legend: A gang of forest bandits.

properties.name: Rurtec Sharks
properties.legend: A gang of forest robbers.

properties.name: Ruined Mausoleum
properties.legend: Ruins of an ancient mausoleum. Untold riches may lie within.

properties.name: Ruined Castle
properties.legend: Ruins of an ancient castle. Untold riches may lie within.

properties.name: Ruined Temple
properties.legend: Ruins of an ancient temple. Untold riches may lie within.

properties.name: Ruined Town
properties.legend: Ruins of an ancient town. Untold riches may lie within.

properties.name: Ruined Sacred site
properties.legend: Ruins of an ancient sacred site. Untold riches may lie within.

properties.name: Ruined Pyramid
properties.legend: Ruins of an ancient pyramid. Untold riches may lie within.

properties.name: Ruined Sacred site

properties.name: Ruined Stronghold

properties.name: Ruined Settlement
properties.legend: Ruins of an ancient settlement. Untold riches may lie within.

properties.name: Grirkrun Archive
properties.legend: A vast collection of knowledge, including many rare and ancient tomes.

properties.name: Travelling Fantastical Circus
properties.legend: Roll up, roll up, this fantastical circus is here for a limited time only.

properties.name: Travelling Wonderous Circus
properties.legend: Roll up, roll up, this wonderous circus is here for a limited time only.

properties.name: Travelling Magical Circus
properties.legend: Roll up, roll up, this magical circus is here for a limited time only.

properties.name: Grimvathar Melee
properties.legend: Warriors from around the land gather for a melee of speed in Grimvathar, with fame, fortune and favour on offer to the victor.

properties.name: Brers Fair
properties.legend: A fair is being held in Brers, with all manner of local and foreign goods and services on offer.

properties.name: Minor Jetty
properties.legend: A small location along the Srurd River to launch boats from sits here, along with a weary looking owner, willing to sell passage along the river.

properties.name: Deer migration
properties.legend: A huge group of deer are migrating, whether part of their annual routine, or something more extraordinary.

properties.name: Scorpions migration
properties.legend: A huge group of scorpions are migrating, whether part of their annual routine, or something more extraordinary.

properties.name: Herons migration
properties.legend: A huge group of herons are migrating, whether part of their annual routine, or something more extraordinary.

properties.name: Apes migration
properties.legend: A huge group of apes are migrating, whether part of their annual routine, or something more extraordinary.

properties.name: Foxes migration
properties.legend: A huge group of foxes are migrating, whether part of their annual routine, or something more extraordinary.

properties.name: Boars migration
properties.legend: A huge group of boars are migrating, whether part of their annual routine, or something more extraordinary.

properties.name: Wolves migration
properties.legend: A huge group of wolves are migrating, whether part of their annual routine, or something more extraordinary.

properties.name: Harmel exhibition
properties.legend: A exhibition has been organised at Harmel as a chance to gather the local elders of the area together to be merry, make alliances and scheme around the crisis.

properties.name: Illusory mirage
properties.legend: This illusory mirage has been luring travellers out of their way for eons.

properties.name: Perculiar mirage
properties.legend: This perculiar mirage has been luring travellers out of their way for eons.

properties.name: Bunal Grotto
properties.legend: The Bunal Grotto. Locals claim that it is endlessly deep and unexplored.

properties.name: Mymerca Portal
properties.legend: An element of the magic portal system connecting major cities. The portals were installed centuries ago, but still work fine.

properties.name: Ratemeaven Portal
properties.legend: An element of the magic portal system connecting major cities. The portals were installed centuries ago, but still work fine.

properties.name: Thasad Portal
properties.legend: An element of the magic portal system connecting major cities. The portals were installed centuries ago, but still work fine.

properties.name: Esenetelume Portal
properties.legend: An element of the magic portal system connecting major cities. The portals were installed centuries ago, but still work fine.

properties.name: Lyvenasin Portal
properties.legend: An element of the magic portal system connecting major cities. The portals were installed centuries ago, but still work fine.

properties.name: Jalddam Portal
properties.legend: An element of the magic portal system connecting major cities. The portals were installed centuries ago, but still work fine.

properties.name: Grites Portal
properties.legend: An element of the magic portal system connecting major cities. The portals were installed centuries ago, but still work fine.

properties.name: Ybar Yur Portal
properties.legend: An element of the magic portal system connecting major cities. The portals were installed centuries ago, but still work fine.

properties.name: Haggheidielren Portal
properties.legend: An element of the magic portal system connecting major cities. The portals were installed centuries ago, but still work fine.

properties.name: Cosmic Rift
properties.legend: A rumoured cosmic rift in this area is causing nearby plants to wither and decay.

properties.name: Cataclysmic Rift
properties.legend: A rumoured cataclysmic rift in this area is causing an emmissary to step through with an all-powerful relic.

properties.name: Disturbed Burial
properties.legend: A burial site has been disturbed in this area, causing the dead to rise and attack the living.

properties.name: Disturbed Burial
properties.legend: A burial site has been disturbed in this area, causing the dead to rise and attack the living.

properties.name: Disturbed Burial
properties.legend: A burial site has been disturbed in this area, causing the dead to rise and attack the living.

properties.name: Disturbed Burial
properties.legend: A burial site has been disturbed in this area, causing the dead to rise and attack the living.

properties.name: Bilgathiz Crypt
properties.legend: An eerie necropolis where nature intertwines with death. Overgrown tombstones are entwined by thorny vines, and mournful spirits wander among the fading petals of once-vibrant flowers

properties.name: Hatham Cemetery
properties.legend: A foreboding necropolis perched atop a jagged cliff, overlooking a desolate wasteland. Its towering walls harbor restless spirits, and the imposing gates bear the marks of countless battles and ancient curses

properties.name: Chawces Necropolis
properties.legend: Rising from the desolate landscape, this sinister necropolis is a testament to necromantic power. Its skeletal spires cast ominous shadows, concealing forbidden knowledge and arcane secrets

properties.name: Nagakeya Necropolis
properties.legend: This ethereal necropolis seems suspended between the realms of the living and the dead. Wisps of mist dance around the tombstones, while haunting melodies linger in the air, commemorating the departed

properties.name: Hatesford Mausoleum
properties.legend: A labyrinthine necropolis where each step echoes with haunting murmurs. The walls are adorned with ancient runes, and restless spirits guide or hinder those who dare to delve into its depths

properties.name: Knasalworth Tomb
properties.legend: A towering necropolis adorned with macabre sculptures and guarded by formidable undead sentinels. Its ancient halls house the remains of fallen heroes, entombed alongside their cherished relics

properties.name: Rocker Cemetery
properties.legend: A foreboding necropolis shrouded in perpetual darkness, where eerie whispers echo through the winding corridors and spectral guardians stand watch over the tombs of long-forgotten souls
